official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate with the city of San Diego, California, in a water reclamation and reuse study.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to participate with the city of San Diego, California, in a study of conceptual plans for water reclamation and reuse. Limits the Federal share of the cost of such study to 50 percent. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate with the city of San Diego, California, in a water reclamation and reuse study.
